title: The Healers of Aro
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental health

description: Describes an experiment in community mental health in Nigeria. Many people from countries engaged in rapid social changes cannot take the cross-cultural shock of development. For these people treatment combines western psychiatric techniques with ancient rituals, thereby not isolating them from society. Narrated by Ben Park.
